projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: yenedaṃ svecchayā sarvaṃ māyayā mohitaṃ jagat /
jagati brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vṛtticchede tvayā kṛte /
tasmāttvaṃ diviro nāma bhuvi khyāto bhaviṣyasi //
luṇṭhyā vadhyāśca pūjyā ye sarva ityavadanmadāt //
hyaḥ kiyanto mayā dattāḥ prāyasthā vijayeśvare //
sa cāsti bhuvi vikhyātaḥ kāyastho bhavatā samaḥ /
brahmahatyā na gaṇyante govadheṣu kathaiva kā /
anye 'pi santi sarvatra tadvidhastu na labhyate /
nītaḥ svajanako yena nidhanaṃ bandhane dhanī //
yadi nāma bhavatpuṇyaiḥ sa sameṣyati madgirā /
sa mahāntaṃ samāsādya duḥsahaṃ daṃśanaṃ viṭam /
tathā hi tāmrajaḥ pūrvaṃ mahān nīto ghaṭo mayā /
kālena ghaṇṭāṃ vikrīya tadaṃśena kṛtā ghaṭī /
krameṇa bhakṣitā sāpi kṛtā śeṣeṇa ghaṇṭikā //
aśo[kaḥ] satataṃ rogī niyogī jayati prabhuḥ //
kā nāma gaṇanā tasya nṛṣu sarvāparādhiṣu //
iti tasya mukhādghoraṃ na cacāla vacaḥ sadā //
pañcaṣāḥ satataṃ tasya karabhā iva bhārikāḥ /
kṛttāṅguṣṭhaḥ sa vāmena pāṇinā diviro rahaḥ /
hāro bhārāyate hematāṭaṅkaṃ me na vallabham /
iti darpagirā tasyā nābhavat kasya vismayaḥ //
khalvāṭaṃ tundilaṃ vṛddhaṃ svapatiṃ sahate katham //
na ca duḥkhābhibhūtāsau rāgadagdhā na lakṣyate //
itthaṃ kā nāma na mayā kṛtā śīlaparāṅmukhī //
na kālo yadi nāmāsau tat kiṃ jīvanahṛnnṛṇām /
purāṇapuṃścalī sā hi jāhnavīṃ manyate tṛṇam //
re re dāsīsutetyādi janaṃ kopena bhartsayan //
bhābhūto kuṅkumārdrau ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ _ rainaisaddṛśau _ _ _ _ ^ _ _ ^ ^ ^ musimusi lakṣaṇau phenaparvau /
_ _ _ _ ^ _ _ maṇikanakadharau divyagandhānuliptau saṅgrāmeṇa praviṣṭau palupa ^ ^ ^ nau labhyatāṃ rājyalakṣmīḥ //
ityādi dattvā bālānāṃ nityaṃ phalahakeṣu saḥ /
nāyaṃ kiñcinmahābhāgo jānāti na ca budhyate /
iti no bhejire lajjā vivastrā api tasya tāḥ //
bhrātṛjāyāṃ svasāraṃ ca tāṃ ca bhāryāṃ mṛgīdṛśam /
dhūrtāḥ svādhīnatāṃ prāptāṃ svairiṇīṃ tāṃ siṣevire //
ājīvamīśvaraḥ śūlī yena na tyajyate janaḥ //
sa vaidyaḥ kālakūṭo vā vyālo vetāla eva vā /
sthitaṃ bhuktaṃ nu pītaṃ nu vaidyeneti pralāpinaḥ //
janatā yāti yanmāndyaṃ tadvaidyasya śaneḥ phalam //
nṛṇāṃ tridoṣakṛtsatyaṃ vaidya eva na tu jvaraḥ //
upasṛtya sa pasparśa stanau tasyāḥ susaṃhatau /
laṅghanaṃ sahate naiṣā hitaṃ śūle na vṛṃhaṇam /
karotu mama cintāsu sarvāhāraṃ mayā saha //
jaḍā hyasyāḥ sthitā buddhirdhātuśca viṣamaḥ sthitaḥ /
na kaścidupakāraṃ te manyate śatravaśca te /
santi tebhyo bhayaṃ deharakṣāyāṃ naiva bādhate //
durbalo dṛśyase bhrātaryūṣaṃ na kuruṣe katham /
apyasti kāmalā nūnaṃ tāṃ mantreṇa nudāmyaham //
dhūrto dhūlipaṭe cakre rāśicakraṃ mudhaiva saḥ //
tāsāṃ madhyān mṛtāḥ pañca pañca śeṣāḥ sthitāḥ khale //
baddhaṃ mayā tatkalatraṃ mudritaṃ sakalaṃ gṛham //
pradadau māsavṛttyaiva te mayā tadgṛhe dhṛtāḥ //
veśyākāminiyogivañcanaguruḥ sadvṛttaśūnyo guruś citraṃ sarvaguruḥ śivoditamahāśikṣāsu nityaṃ laghuḥ //
api nāma sa jāyeta pavitracaritaḥ kṣitau /
karoti praśrayaṃ vakti madhuraṃ diviraḥ puraḥ /
nūnaṃ niśi bhagāpānaṃ karoti diviraḥ sadā /
vipraṃ puraḥ samāyāntaṃ thūtkṛtya tvaritaḥ punaḥ /
jāmātuḥ śrīmato dṛṣṭvā sa gṛhaṃ harṣanirbharaḥ /
kṛtaḥ parājito jetā jayī yaiśca parājitaḥ /

body.p:
iti adhikaraṇabhaṭṭāḥ sātikā vā /
iti narmamālāyāṃ dvitīyaḥ parihāsaḥ //

lg.l: sruksruvau samidho darbhā lājāḥ siddhārtakā ghṛtam /
eko dvau bahavaḥ paścānninyuste bhastrayā tathā /
hāreṇa kiṃ sumadhyāyāḥ sukeśyāḥ kusumena kim /
kiṃ dharmo yatra no raṇḍā dhiksukhaṃ raṇḍayā vinā /
raṇḍā vilokya taruṇaṃ karoti bhrukuṭiṃ mṛṣā /
sravantī nirbharaṃ reto raṇḍā dhenuḥ payo yathā //
gauraḥ supīvaro dhatte raṇḍāyā muṇḍito bhagaḥ /
yadi nāma rate śakto raṇḍāṃ toṣayituṃ na vā //
gatvā gurugṛhaṃ raṇḍā patyuḥ parvadine satī /
ihaiva suciraṃ nātha yāgavyagre tvayi sthite /
ya eṣa prathito loke gṛhakṛtye mahattamaḥ /
yato mūrdhni tvayā hastastasya pañcaphaṇo dhṛtaḥ //
tailonmṛṣṭe manāksneho vadane na tu cakṣuṣi /
hastaṃ dattvā bhage vṛddho nidhānamiva rakṣati //
rātrau vamati tatsarvaṃ bhajate vā viṣūcikām //
sajane taruṇī dṛṣṭvā hrītā yāti rasātalam //
guruṇā saha te śiṣyāḥ papurbhuktottaraṃ ciram //
tataḥ kṣībo guruḥ kiṃ citsvakāvyaṃ deśabhāṣayā /
iti bruvāṇe tanmitre taiḥ śiṣyaiḥ sahite gurau /
sa rājñā hṛtasarvasvaḥ praklinno bandhane ciram /
aho bata muhūrtena bhavanti na bhavanti ca /
piśāca iva duṣprekṣyo dinaireva babhūva saḥ //
api sujanavinodāyombhitā hāsyasiddhyai kathayati phalabhūtaṃ sarvalokopadeśam //
